Adventure Guildsman:
The world is a dark and scary place, my friend! If everyone would only follow the teachings of Eve and Einhasad, this chaos would finally end!
What's needed is a brave warrior like you to stand up for the down-trodden, to restore peace and justice to the world! Are you up to the task?
